pros: A great learning environment, and a positive working environment.
cons: None at the moment, will comment on this in the future.

review_title: Learned alot, not the best company to work for
pros: Good collegues, I've learned alot, I've enjoyed my work.
cons:
You're just a number.. we've worked 12 hours a day instead of 8. We didnt get to take our breaks because it was so busy. We had to do work with 2 people instead of 4 or 5 because people got sick all the time.. it was a mess. Got a Burnout and when i got back from a month abscense they fired me. 
Wage was low for what we had to do every day.
